strings.Value: "A gnome turning into a kobold, to lead a whole tribe of these creatures! Sound like one of the stories I heard from the caravaners in Kelesh."
"This book is writing itself! What a marvelous narrative!"
"Ha, you should hear the stories they tell over beer! Though you're a little too young for them, ha, ha, ha..."
"Stupid gnome. He used to be a disgusting little beast, and now â€” he still is."
